summary.p: 8 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 50; Qurʾānic Text: Q 5:101-5:106, Q 14:44-14:46, Q 22:78, Q 58:4-58:5; 5 lines per page; Dimensions: 255 x 180mm; Script style: kūfī D.I / D.III.
The fragment Marcel 85, Marcel 88 and Marcel 89 (NLR) belongs to the same manuscript; fol. 8 of this manuscript directly follows fol. 5 of Marcel 85.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
"Marcel 50
8 fol. 180×255 mm (1.41666). Support: thin transparent parchment of slightly yellowish color. Writing material: dark brown ink.
Collation: fragments of four quires.
I: S H1F S H2F / F3H S F4H F5H (fol. 1, 4 and 5 are singletons with stubs, fol. 2–3 are a bifolium);
II: H6F (previously par of bifolium);
III: F7H (singleton with a stub);
IV: F7H (singleton with a stub).

Text layout: 82×160 mm (1.95), 5 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: DI / D III. Diacritics: diagonal dashes in the same ink as the main text; modern signs for hamzah, sukūn and shaddah are added with green and sometimes blue paint. Vocalization: red and blue round dots.

Verse markers: for individual verses – rosette (type 3.1.2), in gold and colors; for groups of five verses – medallions on the margins (type 4.A.II) in gold and colors with the inscribed word خمس (л. 2r).
Stitching: thread is preserved in the punctures of the fold.
Defects: minor stains; remnants of gray mold on fol. 8r(?); fragment of the outer margin of fol. 8r. is lost; ink peeling off on the flesh side.
Old accession numbers: B. 28 (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Contents:
Fol. 1r–5v. Surah 5, verses 101(101)–105(106). Incipit:[لكم عفا] الله عنها . Explicit: فيقسمان [بالله ان] .
Fol. 6r–6v. Surah 14, verses 44(44)–44(46). Incipit: [وانذر] الناس . Explicit: أقسمتم [من قبل] .
Fol. 7r–7v. Surah 22, verses 77(78)–78(78). Incipit: [وجهد]وا في الله حق . Explicit: ليكون الر[سول شهيداً] .
Fol. 8r–8v. Surah 58, verses 5(4)–6(5). Incipit: [ورسوله] وتلك حدود الله . Explicit: ايات بينات [وللكافرين عذاب] .
Other fragments of the same manuscript: Marcel 85 (NLR) – NB: fol. 8 of Marcel 50 immediately follows fol. 5 of Marcel 85."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
